summary.span: 实现用于区分区域性的字符串的一组方法。

span.span: Implements a set of methods for culture-sensitive string comparisons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于比较和排序数据的约定因区域性而异。Conventions for comparing and sorting data vary from culture to culture. 例如，排序顺序可能基于拼音或基于字符的可视表示形式。For example, sort order may be based on phonetics or on the visual representation of characters. 在东亚语言中，按文字的笔画和部首对字符进行排序。In East Asian languages, characters are sorted by the stroke and radical of ideographs. 排序也取决于字母表使用的排序语言和区域性。Sorting also depends on the order languages and cultures use for the alphabet. 例如, 丹麦语包含一个 "Æ" 字符, 该字符在字母表中的 "Z" 之后排序。For example, the Danish language has an "Æ" character that it sorts after "Z" in the alphabet. 此外，比较可以区分大小写或不区分大小写，并且大小写规则也可能因区域性而异。In addition, comparisons may be case-sensitive or case-insensitive, and casing rules may also differ by culture. 类负责维护此区分区域性的字符串比较数据并执行区分区域性的字符串运算。The class is responsible for maintaining this culture-sensitive string comparison data and for performing culture-sensitive string operations. 通常，您不必直接实例化 对象，因为所有非序号字符串比较运算会隐式使用一个此对象，包括对 方法的调用。Typically, you do not have to instantiate a object directly, because one is used implicitly by all non-ordinal string comparison operations, including calls to the method. 但是，若要检索 对象，您可通过下列方法之一执行此操作：However, if you do want to retrieve a object, you can do it in one of these ways: - 通过检索特定区域性的 属性的值。By retrieving the value of the property for a particular culture. - 通过使用区域性名称调用静态 方法。By calling the static method with a culture name. 这允许对 对象进行后期绑定访问。This allows for late-bound access to a object. ## 已忽略的搜索值Ignored search values 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 当比较方法（如 和 ）执行区分区域性的比较时，它们不会考虑此类字符。Comparison methods such as and do not consider such characters when they perform a culture-sensitive comparison. 可忽略的字符包括：Ignorable characters include: - 。. 区分区域性的比较方法将始终在要搜索的字符串的开头（索引为零）查找空字符串。Culture-sensitive comparison methods will always find an empty string at the beginning (index zero) of the string being searched. - 字符或由多个字符和运算中未考虑的码位（因为比较选项）构成的字符串，具体而言， 和 选项生成忽略符号和非间距组合字符的搜索。A character or string consisting of characters with code points that are not considered in the operation because of comparison options, In particular, the and options produce searches in which symbols and nonspacing combining characters are ignored. - 带没有语义的码位的字符串。A string with code points that have no linguistic significance. 例如，始终在区分区域性的字符串比较中忽略软连字符 (U+00AD)。For example, a soft hyphen (U+00AD) is always ignored in a culture-sensitive string comparison. ## 安全注意事项Security considerations 如果安全决策取决于字符串比较或大小写更改，则您应使用 属性来确保行为一致，无论操作系统的区域性设置如何。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case change, you should use the property to ensure that the behavior is consistent, regardless of the culture settings of the operating system. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应使用具有类型参数的字符串比较方法来指定预期的比较类型。When possible, you should use string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 与对象关联的对象如何影响字符串比较。The following example shows how the object associated with a object affects string comparison. [!code-cpp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/cpp/CompareInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/CS/CompareInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompareInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompareInfo/VB/CompareInfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载的行为取决于其实现, 该实现可能会从一个版本的公共语言运行时更改为另一个版本, 或从一个 .NET 实现更改为另一个版本。The behavior of this overload is dependent on its implementation, which might change from one version of the common language runtime to another, or from one .NET implementation to another. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果两个字符跨越相等, 则此重载返回相同的值。If two character spans are equal, this overload returns identical values. 但是, 每个唯一字符跨度值没有唯一的哈希代码值。However, there is not a unique hash code value for each unique character span value. 不同的字符跨度可以返回相同的哈希代码。Different character spans can return the same hash code. > > 哈希代码本身不一定是稳定的。The hash code itself is not guaranteed to be stable. 对于单个版本的 .net, 相同字符跨度的哈希代码在不同版本的 .NET 实现和各种平台 (如32位和64位) 之间可能会有所不同。Hash codes for identical character spans can differ across versions of the .NET implementations and across platforms (such as 32-bit and 64-bit) for a single version of .NET. > > 因此, 哈希代码决不能在创建它们的应用程序域的外部使用, 它们永远不应用作集合中的键字段, 它们永远不会保留。As a result, hash codes should never be used outside of the application domain in which they were created, they should never be used as key fields in a collection, and they should never be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的行为依赖于其实现, 该实现可能会从公共语言运行时的一个版本更改为另一个版本, 或从一个 .NET Framework 平台更改为另一个版本。The behavior of is dependent on its implementation, which might change from one version of the common language runtime to another, or from one .NET Framework platform to another. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果两个字符串对象相等, 则该方法将返回相同的值。If two string objects are equal, the method returns identical values. 但是, 每个唯一字符串值没有唯一的哈希代码值。However, there is not a unique hash code value for each unique string value. 不同的字符串可以返回相同的哈希代码。Different strings can return the same hash code. > > 哈希代码本身不一定是稳定的。The hash code itself is not guaranteed to be stable. 对于同一版本的 .NET Framework, 相同字符串的哈希代码可能不同于不同版本的 .NET Framework 和跨平台 (例如32位和64位)。Hash codes for identical strings can differ across versions of the .NET Framework and across platforms (such as 32-bit and 64-bit) for a single version of the .NET Framework. 在某些情况下, 它们甚至不同于应用程序域。In some cases, they can even differ by application domain. > > 因此, 哈希代码决不能在创建它们的应用程序域的外部使用, 它们永远不应用作集合中的键字段, 它们永远不会保留。As a result, hash codes should never be used outside of the application domain in which they were created, they should never be used as key fields in a collection, and they should never be persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串中的每个字符都被给定多个排序权重类别, 包括脚本、字母、大小写和音调符号权重。Each character in a string is given several categories of sort weights, including script, alphabetic, case, and diacritic weights. 排序关键字是特定字符串的这些权重的存储库。A sort key is the repository of these weights for a particular string. 例如, 排序关键字可能包含字母权重的字符串, 后跟大小写权重等字符串。For example, a sort key might contain a string of alphabetic weights, followed by a string of case weights, and so on. 方法等效于带有 LCMAP_SORTKEY 标志的 Windows API `LCMapString`方法。 The method is equivalent to the Windows API method `LCMapString` with the LCMAP_SORTKEY flag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索字符串开头到字符串末尾的源字符串。This method searches the source string from the beginning of the string to the end of the string. 此重载执行区分区域性的搜索。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果`value`表示预构成 Unicode 字符 (如连字 "Æ" (u + 00C6)), 则它可能被视为等效于其组件在正确序列中的任何匹配项, 如 "AE" (u + 0041、u + 0045), 具体取决于区域性。If `value` represents a precomposed Unicode character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要执行序号 (不区分区域性的) 搜索, 其中仅当字符的 Unicode 码位相同时才将其视为等效于另一个字符的, 应调用具有类型的参数的重载, 并使用负值.To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode code points are the same, you should call an overload that has a parameter of type and use the value. 与(执行区分区域性的比较) 不同的是, 用于搜索字符的方法的重载执行序号比较, 而用于搜索字符串的重载执行区分区域性的比较。Unlike , which performs a culture-sensitive comparison, overloads of the method that search for a character perform an ordinal comparison and overloads that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive comparison. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应使用具有类型参数的字符串比较方法来指定预期的比较类型。When possible, you should use string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例将确定字符串中第一个字符或子字符串的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/CPP/indexof.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/CS/indexof.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/VB/indexof.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从字符串的末尾开始向前搜索开始`startIndex`处的源字符串。The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the end of the string. 此重载执行区分区域性的搜索。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果该字符是表示预构成字符的 Unicode 值 (如连字 "Æ" (U + 00C6)), 则它可能被视为等效于正确序列中出现的任何组件 (例如, "AE" (U + 0041, U + 0045), 具体取决于区域性)。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要执行序号 (不区分区域性的) 搜索, 其中, 仅当 Unicode 值相同时, 才将字符视为等效于另一个字符, 应调用具有类型的参数的重载之一, 并使用负值.To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type and use the value. 搜索字符的重载执行序号搜索, 而搜索字符串的重载执行区分区域性的搜索。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应调用具有类型的参数的字符串比较方法, 以指定所需的比较类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定字符或字符串的一部分中的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 请注意, `startIndex`和将在字符串的不同部分中搜索, 即使具有相同的参数也是如此。 Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns 1 to indicate that it has found a match at the position of the "n".

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns 0 (zero) to indicate that the match is found at the beginning of .

para.span: 在下面的示例中, 方法用于在两个字符串中查找三个子字符串 (软连字符 (U + 00AD)、软连字符后跟 "n" 和软连字符后跟 "m")。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

para.span: 由于软连字符是可忽略字符, 因此, 区分区域性的搜索将返回在搜索字符串中未包含软连字符时返回的相同值。

span.span: Because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the same value that it would return if the soft hyphen were not included in the search string.

para.span: 不过, 序号搜索成功地在一个字符串中查找软连字符, 并报告从第二个字符串中缺少它。

span.span: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从字符串的末尾开始向前搜索开始`startIndex`处的源字符串。The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the end of the string. 此方法的值无效。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options` 不包含该值, 此重载将执行区分区域性的搜索。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果该字符是表示预构成字符的 Unicode 值 (如连字 "Æ" (U + 00C6)), 则它可能被视为等效于正确序列中出现的任何组件 (例如, "AE" (U + 0041, U + 0045), 具体取决于区域性)。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. `options` 如果包含值, 则此重载执行序号 (不区分区域性的) 搜索。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search. 仅当 Unicode 值相同时, 才将字符视为等效于另一个字符。A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same. 搜索字符的重载执行序号搜索, 而搜索字符串的重载执行区分区域性的搜索。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应调用具有类型的参数的字符串比较方法, 以指定所需的比较类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定字符或字符串的一部分中的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 请注意, `startIndex`和将在字符串的不同部分中搜索, 即使具有相同的参数也是如此。 Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. para.span: 字符集包括可忽略字符, 这是在执行语言或区分区域性的排序时不考虑的字符。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索中, 如果是可忽略字符, 则结果等效于在删除该字符的情况下进行搜索。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search, if is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 在这种情况下 , 该方法始终返回, 即搜索第一次开始的字符位置。

span.span: In this case, the method always returns , the character position at which the search first began.

para.span: 在下面的示例中, 方法用于查找两个字符串中 "n" 后的软连字符 (U + 00AD)。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the soft hyphen (U+00AD) after an "n" in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

para.span: 在这两种情况下, 因为软连字符为可忽略字符, 所以区分区域性的搜索将返回 1, 指示它在 "n" 的位置找到了匹配项。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns 1 to indicate that it has found a match at the position of the "n".

para.span: 不过, 序号搜索成功地在一个字符串中查找软连字符, 并报告从第二个字符串中缺少它。

span.span: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

para.span: 如果仅包含一个或多个可忽略字符, 则该方法将始终返回, 这是搜索开始处的字符位置。

para.span: 在下面的示例中, 方法用于从两个字符串中的第三个字符位置开始, 查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟 "m" 的位置。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting with the third character position in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，因此，在执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法在字符串中返回索引“m”。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".

para.span: 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

para.span: 字符集包括可忽略字符, 这是在执行语言或区分区域性的排序时不考虑的字符。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search, if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果仅包含一个或多个可忽略字符, 则该方法将始终返回, 这是搜索开始处的字符位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下面的示例中, 方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟 "m" 的位置, 该位置从两个字符串中的第三个到第六个字符位置开始。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting in the third through sixth character positions in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，因此，在执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法在字符串中返回索引“m”。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".

remarks.format: ## Remarks `startIndex`将从`startIndex` + -1 开始向前搜索源字符串。 `count`The source string is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` + `count` - 1. 此方法的值无效。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options` 不包含该值, 此重载将执行区分区域性的搜索。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果该字符是表示预构成字符的 Unicode 值 (如连字 "Æ" (U + 00C6)), 则它可能被视为等效于正确序列中出现的任何组件 (例如, "AE" (U + 0041, U + 0045), 具体取决于区域性)。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. `options` 如果包含值, 则此重载执行序号 (不区分区域性的) 搜索。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search. 仅当 Unicode 值相同时, 才将字符视为等效于另一个字符。A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same. 搜索字符的重载执行序号搜索, 而搜索字符串的重载执行区分区域性的搜索。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应调用具有类型的参数的字符串比较方法, 以指定所需的比较类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定字符或字符串的一部分中的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索中, 如果是可忽略字符, 则结果等效于在删除该字符的情况下进行搜索。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search, if is an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 在这种情况下 , 该方法总是返回, 这是搜索第一次开始的字符位置。

span.span: In this case, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search first began.

para.span: 在下面的示例中, 方法用于查找两个字符串中 "n" 后的软连字符 (U + 00AD)。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the soft hyphen (U+00AD) after an "n" in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

para.span: 在这两种情况下, 因为软连字符为可忽略字符, 所以区分区域性的搜索将返回 1, 指示它在 "n" 的位置找到了匹配项。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns 1 to indicate that it has found a match at the position of the "n".

para.span: 不过, 序号搜索成功地在一个字符串中查找软连字符, 并报告从第二个字符串中缺少它。

span.span: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从源字符串向后搜索, 从字符串末尾开始, 到字符串的开头处结束。The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string. 此重载执行区分区域性的搜索。This overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果该字符是表示预构成字符的 Unicode 值 (如连字 "Æ" (U + 00C6)), 则它可能被视为等效于正确序列中出现的任何组件 (例如, "AE" (U + 0041, U + 0045), 具体取决于区域性)。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. 若要执行序号 (不区分区域性的) 搜索, 其中, 仅当 Unicode 值相同时, 才将字符视为等效于另一个字符, 应调用具有类型的参数的重载之一, 并使用负值.To perform an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same, you should call one of the overloads that has a parameter of type and use the value. 搜索字符的重载执行序号搜索, 而搜索字符串的重载执行区分区域性的搜索。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应调用具有类型的参数的字符串比较方法, 以指定所需的比较类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例将确定字符串中第一个字符或子字符串的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/CPP/indexof.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/CS/indexof.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.CompareInfo.IndexOf/VB/indexof.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从源字符串向后搜索, 从字符串末尾开始, 到字符串的开头处结束。The source string is searched backward starting at the end of the string and ending at the beginning of the string. 此方法的值无效。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options` 不包含该值, 此重载将执行区分区域性的搜索。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 如果该字符是表示预构成字符的 Unicode 值 (如连字 "Æ" (U + 00C6)), 则它可能被视为等效于正确序列中出现的任何组件 (例如, "AE" (U + 0041, U + 0045), 具体取决于区域性)。If the character is a Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), it might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of its components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. `options` 如果包含值, 则此重载执行序号 (不区分区域性的) 搜索。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search. 仅当 Unicode 值相同时, 才将字符视为等效于另一个字符。A character is considered equivalent to another character only if the Unicode values are the same. 搜索字符的重载执行序号搜索, 而搜索字符串的重载执行区分区域性的搜索。Overloads of that search for a character perform an ordinal search, whereas those that search for a string perform a culture-sensitive search. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应调用具有类型的参数的字符串比较方法, 以指定所需的比较类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例将确定字符串中第一个字符或子字符串的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a string. para.span: 在下面的示例中, 方法用于查找包含软连字符 (U + 00AD) 并且在字符串中之前或包含最终 "m" 的子字符串。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find a substring that includes a soft hyphen (U+00AD) and that precedes or includes the final "m" in a string.

para.span: 由于搜索字符串中的软连字符被忽略, 因此调用方法查找包含软连字符的子字符串, 并将 "m" 返回到字符串中的 "m" 的位置, 而调用它可查找包含软连字符的子字符串, "n" 将返回 "n" 的位置。

span.span: Because the soft hyphen in the search string is ignored, calling the method to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "m" returns the position of the "m" in the string, whereas calling it to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "n" returns the position of the "n".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将从字符串开头开始`startIndex`向后搜索源字符串。The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at the beginning of the string. 此方法的值无效。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options` 不包含该值, 此重载将执行区分区域性的搜索。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 表示预构成字符的 Unicode 值 (如连字 "Æ" (U + 00C6)) 可能被视为等效于正确序列中任何字符的组成部分 (例如, "AE" (U + 0041, U + 0045), 具体取决于区域性)。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. `options` 如果包含值, 则此重载执行序号 (不区分区域性) 搜索, 其中 Unicode 值将进行比较。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应调用具有类型的参数的字符串比较方法, 以指定所需的比较类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定字符或字符串的一部分中的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. 请注意, `startIndex`和将在字符串的不同部分中搜索, 即使具有相同的参数也是如此。 Note that and are searching in different portions of the string, even with the same `startIndex` parameter. para.span: 字符集包括可忽略字符, 这是在执行语言或区分区域性的排序时不考虑的字符。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果仅包含一个或多个可忽略字符, 则该方法将始终返回, 这是搜索开始处的字符位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下面的示例中, 方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟 "m" 的位置 (从两个字符串中的最后一个 "m" 开始)。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m", starting with the final "m" in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，因此，在执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法在字符串中返回索引“m”。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".

para.span: 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从源字符串向后`startIndex`搜索, `startIndex` - `count`从 + 1 开始向后搜索。The source string is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` - `count` + 1. 此方法的值无效。The value is not valid for this method. 如果`options` 不包含该值, 此重载将执行区分区域性的搜索。If `options` does not include the value, this overload performs a culture-sensitive search. 表示预构成字符的 Unicode 值 (如连字 "Æ" (U + 00C6)) 可能被视为等效于正确序列中任何字符的组成部分 (例如, "AE" (U + 0041, U + 0045), 具体取决于区域性)。A Unicode value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. `options` 如果包含值, 则此重载执行序号 (不区分区域性) 搜索, 其中 Unicode 值将进行比较。If `options` includes the value, this overload performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where the Unicode values are compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果可能, 应调用具有类型的参数的字符串比较方法, 以指定所需的比较类型。When possible, you should call string comparison methods that have a parameter of type to specify the kind of comparison expected. 作为一般规则, 请使用语言选项 (使用当前区域性) 比较用户界面中显示的字符串, 并为安全比较指定或。As a general rule, use linguistic options (using the current culture) for comparing strings displayed in the user interface and specify or for security comparisons. ## Examples 下面的示例确定字符或字符串的一部分中的第一个和最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example determines the indexes of the first and last occurrences of a character or a substring within a portion of a string. para.span: 字符集包括可忽略字符, 这是在执行语言或区分区域性的排序时不考虑的字符。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive sort.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果仅包含一个或多个可忽略字符, 则该方法将始终返回, 这是搜索开始处的字符位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下面的示例中, 方法用于查找软连字符 (U + 00AD) 后跟 "m" 的位置, 而不是在两个字符串中的最后一个字符位置之前的第一个字符位置。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in all but the first character position before the final "m" in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，因此，在执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法在字符串中返回索引“m”。

span.span: In both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 但当它执行序号比较时, 它只查找第一个字符串中的子字符串。

span.span: When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string.

para.span: 请注意, 对于包含软连字符后跟 "m" 的软连字符的第一个字符串, 该方法将无法返回软连字符的索引, 而是在执行区分区域性的比较时返回 "m" 的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

The name of a culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性可以具有不同的值。The and properties can have different values. 例如, 十六进制0x10407 的属性值标识一种替换排序区域性, 它对名称的排序方式在德语电话簿中出现。For example, an property value of hexadecimal 0x10407 identifies an alternate sort culture that sorts names as they might appear in a German telephone book. 属性的值为 "de_phoneb", 而关联德语 (德国) 区域性的属性的值为 "de"。 The property has a value of "de-de_phoneb", whereas the property of the associated German (Germany) culture has a value of "de-DE". ## Examples 下面的示例使用 fr-fr 和 ja-jp 区域性比较三个字符串。The following example compares three strings using the fr-FR and ja-JP cultures. 属性用于显示每个区域性的名称。The property is used to display the name of each culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重写方法。This method overrides the method. 它将返回一个字符串, 其中包含类名和实例属性的值 (用连字符分隔)。It returns a string that consists of the class name and the value of the instance property, separated by a hyphen.

para.span: 从 .NET Framework 4 开始， 方法返回类名，后跟空格、连字符、空格和 属性的值。

span.span: Staring with the .NET Framework 4, the method returns the class name followed by a space, a hyphen, a space, and the value of the property.

para.span: 例如，对于表示 en-US 区域性的 对象， 方法返回“CompareInfo - en-US”。

span.span: For example, for a object that represents the en-US culture, the method returns "CompareInfo - en-US".

para.span: 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，它返回后跟空格、连字符、空格和 属性的值的类名。

span.span: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, it returns the class name followed by a space, a hyphen, a space, and the value of the property.

para.span: 例如，对于表示 en-US 区域性的 对象， 方法返回“CompareInfo - 1033”。

summary.span: 获取用于比较和排序字符串的 Unicode 版本的相关信息。

span.span: Gets information about the version of Unicode used for comparing and sorting strings.

value.span: 包含用于比较和排序字符串的 Unicode 版本的相关信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains information about the Unicode version used for comparing and sorting strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 各个字符的权重, 因此, 比较或排序特定字符串的方式取决于特定版本的 .NET Framework 所实现的 Unicode 规范的版本。The weight of individual characters, and therefore the way in which particular strings are compared or ordered, depends on the version of the Unicode specification that a particular version of the .NET Framework implements. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 中，这也取决于主机操作系统，如下表所示。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], this also depends on the host operating system, as the following table shows. 请注意，受支持的 Unicode 版本的列表仅适用于字符比较和排序；不适用于 Unicode 字符串按类别分类。Note that this list of supported Unicode versions applies to character comparison and sorting only; it does not apply to classification of Unicode characters by category. |.NET Framework 版本.NET Framework version|操作系统Operating system|Unicode 版本Unicode version| |----------------------------|----------------------|---------------------| |[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]|所有操作系统All operating systems|Unicode 5.0Unicode 5.0| |[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]及更高版本and later versions|[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]|Unicode 5.0Unicode 5.0| |[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]及更高版本and later versions|[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统版本and later Windows operating system versions|Unicode 6。3Unicode 6.3| 由 属性返回的 对象不标识用于比较字符串的准确 Unicode 版本。The object returned by the property doesn't identify the precise Unicode version used to compare strings. 仅在比较两个 对象来确定它们是否使用相同版本的 Unicode 版本和区域性来比较字符串时很有用。It is useful only when comparing two objects to determine whether they use the same Unicode version and culture to compare strings. 有关详细信息和示例，请参见 引用页。For more information and an example, see the reference page.
